meanings.definition: The act of making something as large or great as possible.
meanings.sent1: The maximization of profits is the main goal for many businesses.
meanings.sent2: She focused on the maximization of her time to complete all her tasks efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the biggest pumpkin was a fun example of maximization at the county fair.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to fitness was a maximization of her physical potential.
meanings.sent5: The maximization of resources in the project made it a huge success.

meanings.definition: The process of increasing to the greatest possible amount or degree.
meanings.sent1: The maximization of savings is important for future financial security.
meanings.sent2: The maximization of productivity led to a record-breaking month for the team.
meanings.sent3: The maximization of ice cream scoops on a cone made it a tower of deliciousness.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to learning was a maximization of his knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The maximization of sunlight in the room made it warm and inviting.
